about_the_game:
Dear player, we thank you for appreciating our product, we put our soul and effort so that you can spend time with maximum pleasure from the process. We are developing our projects, so here is a list of what we want to add to this project, this is not the final list, it is always being finalised. We are open to suggestions, your wishes and complaints you can always send through our official website. Regards, Geomax GG team.

One day the wind brought a small cloud into a dense forest. It was flying too low and hit a branch of an old tree. Suddenly the cloud exploded, and in its place an image in a cloak and hat appeared. This is how the mysterious wizard appeared, who became the defence of the forest from the invading hordes of evil. Rumour has it that there are more and more mysterious clouds in the forest, and you can meet other wizards, opposing the armies of darkness.

Try on the role of a wizard and set your record-breaking race distance while killing as many opponents as possible. Be careful! Enemies are armed with swords, shields and magic spells, and you may encounter various obstacles along the way. Complete new quests every day and pick up a random reward.

Runner

Jump over rocks, bushes, rivers and lakes.
Dodge trees, large boulders and enemy attacks.
Do a roll under fallen trees.

Shooter

Hit enemies who like to dodge projectiles.
Shoot deliberately - the staff has a cooldown that depends on its level.
Shoot down an enemy's shield and then finish him off.
Dodge or shoot back at enemy projectiles.
Find a mushroom that temporarily boosts your attack.

Customisation

Unlock new costumes that give various upgrades.
Buy new staffs with various enhancements.
Match your fireball to your look and go into battle.
Combine different magic powers, customisation elements and create unique wizards.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Become a real wizard and fight off hordes of enemies. Explore the mysterious forest, overcome obstacles and dodge enemy attacks. Customise your character, learn new spells, get rewards and set record-breaking distances.
